sentence.Network_en: A bewhiskered face, here magnified 15 times, belies the beauty of a nymphalid butterfly.
sentence.Network_cn: 这只蛱蝶头部被放大15倍后, 脸部的毛须掩盖了它的美丽.

PerfectNetExp.abs: nymphal 幼虫的nymphalid 蛱蝶科动物nymphean 少女的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from modern Latin Nymphalidae, from Latin nympha 'nymph'

means.word_mean: 1. medium to large butterflies found worldwide typically having brightly colored wings and much-reduced nonfunctional forelegs carried folded on the breast
